CommandDefinition.Name: undeploydatatype
CommandDefinition.Description: Undeploy a datatype. The optional --ignore disables checks for running workflows.

Argument.Name: fqDatatypeName
Argument.Description: The fully qualified path to the XMOM entity

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application in which the datatype will be undeployed.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application in which the datatype will be undeployed.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace in which the datatype will be undeployed.
